November 28# 1939
Honorable F. H. LaGuardia
Mayor of the City of New York
Municipal Building
New York City, New York
Dear Mr. Mayor;
I thought you would be interested in knowing that
I have written educational stations who might
possibly rebroadoatft programs from WRUL, suggesting
that they apply immediately to the Federal Communi¬
cations Commission for permission to rebroadcast on
an experimental basis, programs of WRUL. It is my
understanding that this action mights aid the
Commission on x%eaohing a favorable decision on your
application.
To my knowledge WILL (University of Illinois) and
KW3C (State College of Washington) have already ap¬
plied. It is also my understanding that similar
action has been taken, or will be taken by W3UI
(University of Iowa) and WH& (University of Wisconsin).
It was a pleasure for me to appear at your hearing
before the Commission and I trust that I did the
application some little good at least.
Cordially yours#
Frank E. Sohooley
